title: Dark Star Soraka.
body:
Riot, I need this now. Plz.


Artist: Dante Liu
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/3nObm

replies.body: It's always such a treat to see new work from Dante ^^ his Dark Star Hecarim is really badass too!

Hm, how should I feel about this..

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
i’m soraka main and i need this skin or i’ll get crazy
My bae has just gotten really kinky.
Looks sick, I don't even like playing Soraka but I want this.
Dood... I sure as hell would buy this....

> [{quoted}](name=AngeloDavid,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ylQyUZIA,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-07-14T12:21:29.163+0000)
>
> Dood... I sure as hell would buy this....

Oi mate.

Don't necro 9 month old threads.

That's against the (Updated) Boards Universal Rules under "Spamming & Trolling".
My bad, the oldest comment on here was like a month ago.

I've hated soraka a lot ever since they ruined her with her rework but all that aside, this would be so fitting. In that universe she would be the darkest star of all, completely removed from any semblance of compassion and mercy that defines her current lore. It would be so easy to give her dark star skills and that splash art looks great, they should really consider having her float ominously over land like a harbinger of emptiness and death instead of her crappy goat legs.

i like this alot, i think a dark star soraka would work, but one question i want to ask is how would her abilities work? like how would they look, like her ult. i cant even imagine what it would look like but it must look cool.

Looks epic. 

Love how it looks like the corrupted version of Cosmic Blade Yi (to which I think the Dark Stars are the actual antitheses of, rather than those Star Guardians).
Can you make it 3440x1440 for my wallpaper? Pls
